https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fiXnC6A7qR8siCjnP88XuHfx10P.jpg The story behind Blondie's album Parallel Lines, which sold 16 million copies and captured the spirit of 1970s New York at a time of poverty, crime and an exploding artistic life. Blondie's New York and the Making of Parallel Lines
